channel.title: [PI] can someone help me fix this code please

item.title: [PI] can someone help me fix this code please
item.dc:creator: @mage_pwns mage pwns
item.description:
@mage_pwns wrote:

    public void process() {
	ArrayList<GroundItem> toRemove = new ArrayList<GroundItem>();
	for (int j = 0; j < items.size(); j++) {
	    if (items.get(j) != null) {
		GroundItem i = items.get(j);
		if (i.hideTicks > 0) {
		    i.hideTicks--;
		}
		if (i.hideTicks == 1) { // item can now be seen by others
		    i.hideTicks = 0;
		    createGlobalItem(i);
		    i.removeTicks = HIDE_TICKS;
		}
		if (i.removeTicks > 0) {
		    i.removeTicks--;
		}
		if (i.removeTicks == 1) {
		    i.removeTicks = 0;
		    toRemove.add(i);
		    // removeGlobalItem(i, i.getItemId(), i.getItemX(),
		    // i.getItemY(), i.getItemAmount());
		}

	    }

how do i make items appear straight away when the person has been pked? instead of the person being able to teleport back and pick everything up

Read full topic
